General.Name: Seera Group Holding
General.Description: Seera Holding Group, together with its subsidiaries, provides travel and tourism services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom, Egypt, the United Arab Emirates, Spain, and Kuwait. It offers air, ferry, and train ticketing services; hotel booking and package holidays services; transportation, Hajj and Umrah, education, furnished suites and hotels, and shipping services; and property rental, rooms on rent, car rental, and other services, as well as chartered flights and delivery of shipments, and rooms and food and beverages services. The company is also involved in the events management, ownership and operation aircrafts, travel and cargo, real estate, and sports activities. In addition, it provides telecommunications and SMS and/MMS services. The company offers its products and services under the Discover Saudi, Almosafer, Mawasim, and Lumi brands. The company was formerly known as Al Tayyar Travel Group Holding Company and changed its name to Seera Holding Group in April 2019. Seera Holding Group was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
